statusLine.command: input=$(cat); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); worktree=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$worktree" && git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null || echo "no-git"); usage=$(echo "$input" | jq '.context_window.current_usage'); if [ "$usage" != "null" ]; then context_tokens=$(echo "$usage" | jq '.input_tokens + .cache_creation_input_tokens + .cache_read_input_tokens'); else context_tokens=0; fi; if [ "$context_tokens" -ge 1000 ]; then tokens_short="$((context_tokens / 1000))k"; else tokens_short="$context_tokens"; fi; printf '\033[36m%s\033[0m · \033[35m%s\033[0m · \033[33m%s\033[0m · \033[34m%s\033[0m' "$model" "$(basename "$worktree")" "$branch" "$tokens_short"
